title: Africans transported to new world graph - change

content.question: The pattern depicted on the graph from 1450 to 1800 best serves as evidence of which of the following?

choices.label: The replacement of indigenous labor and indentured servitude by enslaved Africans in New World colonies
The development of varied systems of racial categorization in the European colonies
The effectiveness of the abolitionist movement in Europe and the Americas
The susceptibility of enslaved populations to New World diseases

content.answer: The replacement of indigenous labor and indentured servitude by enslaved Africans in New World colonies

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
